original: bzang po ni 'khrig pa'o //üîΩkhyu mchog ni karka ta'o //
analyzed: bzang po ni 'khrig pa'o // khyu mchog ni karka ta'o //
translated: Good is copulation.üîΩBull is Cancer.

original: rus sbal ni seng ge'o //
analyzed: rus sbal ni seng ge'o //
translated: Turtle is Leo.

original: chu srin ni gzhon nu ma'o //üîΩyugs sa mo ni srang ngo //
analyzed: chu srin ni gzhon nu ma'o // yugs sa mo ni srang ngo //
translated: Crocodile is Virgo.üîΩWidow is Libra.

original: sme ba ni sdig pa'o //üîΩ'bugs pa ni gzhu'o //
analyzed: sme ba ni sdig pa'o // 'bugs pa ni gzhu'o //
translated: Mole is Scorpio.üîΩPiercing is Sagittarius.

original: 'phyo ba ni chu srin no //
analyzed: 'phyo ba ni chu srin no //
translated: Floating is Capricorn.

original: rmi lam ni bum pa'o //
analyzed: rmi lam ni bum pa'o //
translated: Dream is Aquarius.

original: sa'i dbang phyug ni nya'o //
analyzed: sa'i dbang phyug ni nya'o //
translated: Lord of the Earth is Pisces.

original: de la lug gi chu tshod gsum la /
analyzed: de la lug gi chu tshod gsum la /
translated: In that, there are three hours of Aries,

original: tha skar dang / bra nye dang / smin drug gi bzhi cha gcig ste dgu'o //
analyzed: tha skar dang / bra nye dang / smin drug gi bzhi cha gcig ste dgu'o //
translated: three of Taurus, and one quarter of Gemini, making nine.

original: de'i 'og ma khyu mchog gi chu tshod bzhi la smin drug bzhi cha gsum dang / snar ma dang mgo'i phyed do //
analyzed: de'i 'og ma khyu mchog gi chu tshod bzhi la smin drug bzhi cha gsum dang / snar ma dang mgo'i phyed do //
translated: After that, there are four hours of Taurus, three quarters of Gemini, and half of Cancer.

original: de'i 'og tu 'khrig pa'i chu tshod lnga la mgo'i phyed dang / lag dang na bso'i bzhi cha gsum mo //üîΩde'i 'og tu karka ta'i chu tshod de dang 'dra ba la nab so'i bzhi cha gcig dang rgyal dang skag go //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu 'khrig pa'i chu tshod lnga la mgo'i phyed dang / lag dang na bso'i bzhi cha gsum mo //üîΩde'i 'og tu karka ta'i chu tshod de dang 'dra ba la nab so'i bzhi cha gcig dang rgyal dang skag go //
translated: After that, there are five hours of Cancer, half of Leo, and three quarters of Virgo.üîΩAfter that, there are five hours of Leo, one quarter of Virgo, and Libra and Scorpio.

original: de'i 'og tu seng ge'i chu tshod bzhi la mchu dang gre dang dbo'i bzhi cha gcig go //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu seng ge'i chu tshod bzhi la mchu dang gre dang dbo'i bzhi cha gcig go //
translated: After that, for four hours of the lion, [the sun] moves one fourth of mouth, throat, and heart.

original: de'i 'og tu bu mo'i chu tshod gsum la dbo'i bzhi cha gsum dang me bzhi dang nag pa'i phyed do //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bu mo'i chu tshod gsum la dbo'i bzhi cha gsum dang me bzhi dang nag pa'i phyed do //
translated: After that, for three hours of the maiden, [the sun] moves three fourths of heart, all of mouth, and half of Aries.

original: de'i 'og tu srang gi chu tshod lnga la nag pa'i phyed dang sa ga dang sa ri'i bzhi cha gsum mo //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu srang gi chu tshod lnga la nag pa'i phyed dang sa ga dang sa ri'i bzhi cha gsum mo //
translated: After that, for five hours of the scales, [the sun] moves half of Aries, all of Taurus, and three fourths of Gemini.

original: de'i 'og tu sdig pa'i chu tshod bdun las ga'i bzhi cha gcig dang lha mtshams dang snon no //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu sdig pa'i chu tshod bdun las ga'i bzhi cha gcig dang lha mtshams dang snon no //
translated: After that, for seven hours of the scorpion, [the sun] moves one fourth of Gemini, all of Cancer, and Leo.

original: de'i 'og tu gzhu'i chu tshong drug la snubs dang chu stod dang / chu smad kyi bzhi cha gcig go //üîΩde'i 'og tu chu srin gyi chu tshod de dang 'dra ba la chu smad kyi bzhi cha gsum dang gro bzhin dang / mon gru'i phyed do //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gzhu'i chu tshong drug la snubs dang chu stod dang / chu smad kyi bzhi cha gcig go // de'i 'og tu chu srin gyi chu tshod de dang 'dra ba la chu smad kyi bzhi cha gsum dang gro bzhin dang / mon gru'i phyed do //
translated: After that, for six hours of the bow, [the sun] moves one fourth of Leo, all of Virgo, and half of Libra.üîΩAfter that, for seven hours of the sea monster, [the sun] moves three fourths of Libra, all of Scorpio, and half of Sagittarius.

original: de'i 'og tu bum pa'i chu tshod bdun la mon gru'i phyed dang mon gre dang khrums stod kyi cha gsum mo //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bum pa'i chu tshod bdun la mon gru'i phyed dang mon gre dang khrums stod kyi cha gsum mo //
translated: After that, for seven hours of the pitcher, [the sun] moves half of Sagittarius, all of Capricorn, and three fourths of Aquarius.

original: de nas nya'i chu tshod lnga la khrums stod kyi cha gcig dang khrums smad dang nam gru'o //
analyzed: de nas nya'i chu tshod lnga la khrums stod kyi cha gcig dang khrums smad dang nam gru'o //
translated: Then, at the fifth watch of the night, the first part of DhanisthƒÅ, ≈öatabhi·π£ƒÅ, and Pro·π£·π≠hapad

original: de ltar na lug la sogs pa'i nyi ma rnams ni skar ma gsum gsum la longs spyod par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na lug la sogs pa'i nyi ma rnams ni skar ma gsum gsum la longs spyod par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, the days of Aries and so on are to be seen as enjoying three stars each.üîΩIf there is no death or cutting off,

original: shi chad du ma gyar na @66b zhes bya ba la chad pa ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba ste /
analyzed: shi chad du ma gyar na @66b zhes bya ba la chad pa ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba ste /
translated: Cutting off is untimely death.

original: nyi ma dang zla ba dang lo dgu'i bar du shi chad du ma gyur na'o //
analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba dang lo dgu'i bar du shi chad du ma gyur na'o //
translated: If there is no death or cutting off for up to nine years of the sun, moon, and years.

original: phyug cing skal ba bzang po dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa 'di dag kyang 'phel ba'i chu tshod dang po la ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: phyug cing skal ba bzang po dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa 'di dag kyang 'phel ba'i chu tshod dang po la ni ma yin gyi /
translated: These characteristics beginning with ‚Äúwealthy and fortunate‚Äù are not taught for the first watch of the increasing moon,

original: gnyis pa dang gsum pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa dang gsum pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: but should be seen as being for the completion of the second and third watches.

original: de ltar 'og nas 'byung ba thams cad la sbyar ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'og nas 'byung ba thams cad la sbyar ro //
translated: Thus, this should be applied to all that comes below.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: sa'i dbang phyug gi nyi ma la 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sa'i dbang phyug gi nyi ma la 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One will die on the day of the lord of the earth.

original: lo brgyad cu rtsa gcig bzlas nas sa'i dbang phyug gi zla ba dang tshes dang skad cig de la 'chi bar 'gyur te thams cad la de ltar blta'o //
analyzed: lo brgyad cu rtsa gcig bzlas nas sa'i dbang phyug gi zla ba dang tshes dang skad cig de la 'chi bar 'gyur te thams cad la de ltar blta'o //
translated: Having recited for eighty-one years, he will die at that moment of the moon and the lunar day of the lord of the earth. All should be seen in this way.

original: sa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: sa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'o //
translated: The lord of the earth is desire.

original: 'dis ni 'phel ba la sogs pa g-yon skor du dgod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'phel ba la sogs pa g-yon skor du dgod pa'o //
translated: This is the arrangement of the left circle of increase, and so on.

original: yang na g-yon skor du brtsi ba'o //
analyzed: yang na g-yon skor du brtsi ba'o //
translated: Or it is the calculation of the left circle.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: chos shes pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: chos shes pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: With regard to knowledge of Dharma,

original: chos ni mtho ris dang / byar grol gyi rgyu ste bsod nams kyis chos so //
analyzed: chos ni mtho ris dang / byar grol gyi rgyu ste bsod nams kyis chos so //
translated: Dharma is the cause of heaven and liberation, that is, meritorious Dharma.

original: shes pa ni byed pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa ni byed pa'o //
translated: Knowledge is the agent.

original: mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni rtog ge dang lung shes pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni rtog ge dang lung shes pa'o //
translated: Skill is knowledge of logic and scripture.

original: tshangs par spyod cing zhes bya ba ni chang dang bud med la sogs pa spong ba'o //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod cing zhes bya ba ni chang dang bud med la sogs pa spong ba'o //
translated: Celibate is to abandon alcohol, women, and so on.

original: bzo shes pa dang zhes bya ba ni glu dang gar dang rol mo'i sbyor ba la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: bzo shes pa dang zhes bya ba ni glu dang gar dang rol mo'i sbyor ba la mkhas pa'o //
translated: Knowledge of arts is skill in the application of song, dance, and music.

original: bstan bcos thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la bstan bcos thams cad ni sgra'i bstan bcos la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la bstan bcos thams cad ni sgra'i bstan bcos la sogs pa'o //
translated: All treatises will be expanded means that all treatises are treatises on grammar and so on.

original: rgyas pa ni de dag gi sbyor ba la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyas pa ni de dag gi sbyor ba la mkhas pa'o //
translated: Expansion means skill in their application.

original: the tshom med pa ni bden pa'o //
analyzed: the tshom med pa ni bden pa'o //
translated: Non-doubt means truth.

original: nyi ma bzhi 'am lnga'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni shi chad du ma gyur na zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: nyi ma bzhi 'am lnga'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni shi chad du ma gyur na zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: Four or five suns and so on are connected with if they do not cease.

original: tshig rtsub smra ba zhes bya ba ni tshig brlang po smra ba ste /
analyzed: tshig rtsub smra ba zhes bya ba ni tshig brlang po smra ba ste /
translated: Harsh speech means speaking harshly.

original: gang gis brlang po smra bar byed pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gis brlang po smra bar byed pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: One who does that is called a harsh speaker.

original: sdig pa'i las la nan tan byed pa zhes bya ba ni brnab sems dang gnod sems dang / log par lta ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sdig pa'i las la nan tan byed pa zhes bya ba ni brnab sems dang gnod sems dang / log par lta ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Diligence in evil actions means being endowed with perfect covetousness, ill will, and wrong view.

original: 'phya ba zhes bya ba ni ma dpyad bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'phya ba zhes bya ba ni ma dpyad bar byed pa'o //
translated: Scolding means criticizing without analysis.

original: seng ge dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni mthon po la brten pa nyid dang / rang gis bsgrub pa'i yo byad la longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: seng ge dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni mthon po la brten pa nyid dang / rang gis bsgrub pa'i yo byad la longs spyod pa'o //
translated: The phrase like a lion means that he is elevated and enjoys the wealth he has acquired on his own.

original: sdug bsngal mang ba zhes bya ba ni thog ma dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal mang ba zhes bya ba ni thog ma dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba'o //
translated: The phrase many sufferings means that he is poor and suffers at the beginning.

original: yo byad 'phel zhing zhes bya ba ni de'i tshe smad la phyug por gyur pa ste /üîΩde nyid gsungs pa nor dang phyugs mang ba la zhes bya ba la nor rnams @67a * //
analyzed: yo byad 'phel zhing zhes bya ba ni de'i tshe smad la phyug por gyur pa ste / de nyid gsungs pa nor dang phyugs mang ba la zhes bya ba la nor rnams @67a * //
translated: The phrase increasing wealth means that he becomes rich later in life.

original: dang phyugs rnams zhes zlas phye nas phyis mang ba zhes gcig tu mtshams sbyar ba'am /
analyzed: dang phyugs rnams zhes zlas phye nas phyis mang ba zhes gcig tu mtshams sbyar ba'am /
translated: The phrase much wealth and many cattle refers to this. The words wealth and cattle are in apposition, and the word much is a separate word that modifies both.

original: yang na nor phyugs mang ba zhes khyad par du bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang na nor phyugs mang ba zhes khyad par du bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: Or, the phrase much wealth and cattle is a dvandva compound, and the word much is a separate word that modifies both.

original: cung zad tsam gyis khro ba zhes bya ba ni skad cig gis khro zhing skad cig gis zhi ba'o //
analyzed: cung zad tsam gyis khro ba zhes bya ba ni skad cig gis khro zhing skad cig gis zhi ba'o //
translated: The phrase easily angered means that he is angry for a moment and then is at peace for a moment.

original: nga rgyal che ba ni khengs sems che ba'o //
analyzed: nga rgyal che ba ni khengs sems che ba'o //
translated: The phrase great pride means that he is very conceited.

original: dgra rnams la 'jigs zhes bya ba ni dgra rnams kyis 'jigs pa ste /
analyzed: dgra rnams la 'jigs zhes bya ba ni dgra rnams kyis 'jigs pa ste /
translated: The phrase fear of enemies means that he is afraid of enemies.

original: khong sngar ba'o //
analyzed: khong sngar ba'o //
translated: He is as before.

original: khe spogs kyis 'tsho ba ni tshong gis 'tsho ba'o //
analyzed: khe spogs kyis 'tsho ba ni tshong gis 'tsho ba'o //
translated: He lives by profit is he who lives by trade.

original: rmongs pa dang sdig pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa ni smra mi mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: rmongs pa dang sdig pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa ni smra mi mkhas pa'o //
translated: He is ignorant and has a sinful nature is he who is ignorant, who is not skilled in speech.

original: sdig pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa ni bya ba dan pa la 'jug pa'i bsam pa can no //
analyzed: sdig pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa ni bya ba dan pa la 'jug pa'i bsam pa can no //
translated: He has a sinful nature is he who has the nature of engaging in improper actions.

original: ngang tshul ngan pa ni spro thung ba'o /
analyzed: ngang tshul ngan pa ni spro thung ba'o /
translated: He is of bad character is he who is irascible.

original: rang gi rigs bstod cing zhes bya ba ni rigs mthon por skye ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi rigs bstod cing zhes bya ba ni rigs mthon por skye ba'o //
translated: He praises his own family is he who is born into a high family.

original: bstan bcos phun sum tshogs zhes bya ba ni rgyal khrims la sogs pa'i lugs kyi bstan bcos phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos phun sum tshogs zhes bya ba ni rgyal khrims la sogs pa'i lugs kyi bstan bcos phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: He is skilled in the treatises is he who is skilled in the treatises on royal policy, etc.

original: bzo sna tshogs rig pa ni gar la sogs pa'i bzo sna tshogs la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: bzo sna tshogs rig pa ni gar la sogs pa'i bzo sna tshogs la mkhas pa'o //
translated: He is skilled in various arts is he who is skilled in various arts such as dancing.

original: g-yo sgyu can zhes bya ba la g-yo dang sgyu ni g-yo sgyu ste /
analyzed: g-yo sgyu can zhes bya ba la g-yo dang sgyu ni g-yo sgyu ste /
translated: He is deceitful is he who is deceitful.

original: de su la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de su la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He who has that is called that.

original: bya ba thams cad yang ba zhes bya ba ni dgos so cog myur du 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad yang ba zhes bya ba ni dgos so cog myur du 'grub pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAll actions are light‚Äù means that all needs are quickly accomplished.

original: bde bar 'tsho zhes bya ba ni cung zad kyis bde ba rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: bde bar 'tsho zhes bya ba ni cung zad kyis bde ba rnyed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne lives happily‚Äù means that one finds happiness with little difficulty.

original: rgyal po'i chad pas gcod cing zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i khrims las 'da' zhing chad pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal po'i chad pas gcod cing zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i khrims las 'da' zhing chad pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne is punished by the king‚Äù means that one is subject to the king‚Äôs laws and punishments.

original: dor thabs kyi bzo zhes bya ba ni rol mo la sogs pa 'khrul 'khor gyi bzo'o //
analyzed: dor thabs kyi bzo zhes bya ba ni rol mo la sogs pa 'khrul 'khor gyi bzo'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne is skilled in gambling‚Äù means that one is skilled in the arts of deception, such as gambling.

original: rtag tu sems khral can zhes bya ba ni rtag tu gzhan gyi ched la zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu sems khral can zhes bya ba ni rtag tu gzhan gyi ched la zhugs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne is always anxious‚Äù means that one is always occupied with the affairs of others.

original: bu dang chung ma gsod pa zhes bya ba ni chung ma blangs ba dang bu skyes pa rnams myur du 'chi bar 'gyur zhing ring du mi 'tshe ba'o //
analyzed: bu dang chung ma gsod pa zhes bya ba ni chung ma blangs ba dang bu skyes pa rnams myur du 'chi bar 'gyur zhing ring du mi 'tshe ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne kills one‚Äôs children and wife‚Äù means that one‚Äôs wife and children die quickly and do not live long.

original: sems chung ba ni sems sras pa'o //
analyzed: sems chung ba ni sems sras pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne is timid‚Äù means that one is fearful.

original: bsam pa ngan pa ni rtag tu sems sdug pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa ngan pa ni rtag tu sems sdug pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne has evil thoughts‚Äù means that one always has a sorrowful mind.

original: 'phel ba'i nyi ma la zhes bya ba la sogs bas ni skad cig gang la nad kyis zin pa'i dge ba dang sdig pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste go sla'o //
analyzed: 'phel ba'i nyi ma la zhes bya ba la sogs bas ni skad cig gang la nad kyis zin pa'i dge ba dang sdig pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste go sla'o //
translated: The day of increase and so on indicate the characteristics of the virtue and sin of one who is seized by the disease in a particular moment, which is easy to understand.

original: dug bzlog pa bshad par bzhed nas gsungs pa /üîΩgang gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dug bzlog pa bshad par bzhed nas gsungs pa / gang gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Desiring to explain the antidote to poison, he says:

original: gang gi mche bas mngon zin na //
analyzed: gang gi mche bas mngon zin na //
translated: The one who is bitten by whose fangs and so on.

original: 'chi bdag dang ni mnyam par 'grogs //
analyzed: 'chi bdag dang ni mnyam par 'grogs //
translated: One who is bitten by the fangs of the one who is equal to the Lord of Death

original: zhes bya ba ni gsor mi rung ba bstan pa yin te rva can bzhi la zin pa dag 'chi bdag gis sgor gzhol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsor mi rung ba bstan pa yin te rva can bzhi la zin pa dag 'chi bdag gis sgor gzhol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: indicates the incurable, meaning that those bitten by the four-tusked one will be directed to the door of the Lord of Death.

original: de rnams zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
translated: Those refers to the yogis.

original: ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bkra shis par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bkra shis par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: How will they be accomplished? means how will they be auspicious?

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He says just that:

original: tshe @67b dang nad med ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: tshe @67b dang nad med ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Life, health, and so on.

original: tshe ni srog go //
analyzed: tshe ni srog go //
translated: Life is the life force.

original: spel ba ni yun ring du 'cho ba'o //
analyzed: spel ba ni yun ring du 'cho ba'o //
translated: Increase means prolonging it.

original: gzhan la zhes pa ni gsor rung ba ste brgyad po dag la'o //
analyzed: gzhan la zhes pa ni gsor rung ba ste brgyad po dag la'o //
translated: The others are the eight who are curable.

original: dug bsdu ba'i sbyor ba'i chog ji ltar sbyar zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: dug bsdu ba'i sbyor ba'i chog ji ltar sbyar zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: The question is, How is the rite of poison extraction to be applied?

original: de la dug bsdu ba ni dug dbrog pa'o //
analyzed: de la dug bsdu ba ni dug dbrog pa'o //
translated: Therein, extraction is the removal of poison.

original: sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mchan nyid do //üîΩde dag gis ni 'di skang du bkra shis kyi dngos grub tshe dang nad med pa spel ba dang // dug gis zin pa gsor rung ba gzhan dag la dug bsdu ba'i chog ji ltar bgyi zhes gsol ba btab pa ston to //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mchan nyid do // de dag gis ni 'di skang du bkra shis kyi dngos grub tshe dang nad med pa spel ba dang // dug gis zin pa gsor rung ba gzhan dag la dug bsdu ba'i chog ji ltar bgyi zhes gsol ba btab pa ston to //
translated: The application is the basis of meditative concentration.

original: bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: This is what is being said: How is the rite of poison extraction to be applied to others who are curable and who have been seized by poison, in order to increase their life and health, which are the accomplishments of auspiciousness?üîΩThe Blessed One said, Good! Good, Subh≈´ti!

original: chu'i sbyin sreg ces bya ba ni chur mchod sbyin bya ba ste /
analyzed: chu'i sbyin sreg ces bya ba ni chur mchod sbyin bya ba ste /
translated: The water sacrifice is the sacrifice in water.
