analyzed: slar yang bdug pas bya zhes bya ba ni de nas dbab pa'i phyir yungs kar dkar po la sogs pas bdug pa de dag nyid kyis bdugs na 'dar zhing yan lag bskyod la mig 'byed par gyur pa dang / de nas h'um zhes bya bas rnam par shes pa bsdams na dug med par 'gyur ro ;
translated: Having enchanted white mustard seeds, etc., one should fumigate with those very things. If one trembles, moves the limbs, and opens the eyes, then, having bound the consciousness with the syllable H≈™·πÄ, one should make it free from poison.

original: / dpyid zla 'bring sogs rim bzhin du //
analyzed: / dpyid zla 'bring sogs rim bzhin du //
translated: In the middle month of spring, etc.,

original: zhes bya ba la 'phel ba la sogs pa dang / dpyid zla 'bring po la sogs pa rim bzhin du sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'phel ba la sogs pa dang / dpyid zla 'bring po la sogs pa rim bzhin du sbyar ba'o //
translated: In the middle month of spring, etc., one should apply the increase, etc.

original: nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe //
analyzed: nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe //
translated: When the sun moves north,

original: zhes bya ba ni dpyid zla 'bring po de nyid nas brtsams nas nyi ma byang du 'gro ba yin la de nyid ni lo'i dang po dang dus kyi mchog go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpyid zla 'bring po de nyid nas brtsams nas nyi ma byang du 'gro ba yin la de nyid ni lo'i dang po dang dus kyi mchog go //
translated: Beginning from that very middle month of spring, the sun moves north. That is the first month of the year and the best time.

original: ji lta'i dus bzhi zhes bya ba ni dpyid dang / sos ka la sogs pa'i dus te /
analyzed: ji lta'i dus bzhi zhes bya ba ni dpyid dang / sos ka la sogs pa'i dus te /
translated: The four seasons are spring, summer, and so on.

original: de dag tu 'phel ba dang 'bri bar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag tu 'phel ba dang 'bri bar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: They should be applied to the increase and decrease.

original: mtshan ma ni grangs kyi ri mo'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma ni grangs kyi ri mo'o //
translated: The signs are the marks of the numbers.

original: rim gyis rim gyis zhes bya ba ni nyi ma nas nyi ma dang zla ba nas zla bar chu tshod rim gyis 'phel zhing 'bri ba ste /
analyzed: rim gyis rim gyis zhes bya ba ni nyi ma nas nyi ma dang zla ba nas zla bar chu tshod rim gyis 'phel zhing 'bri ba ste /
translated: Gradually, gradually means that the hours increase and decrease from day to day and from month to month.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:üîΩThe hours of the day

original: nyin mo yi ni chu tshod dag / ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nyin mo yi ni chu tshod dag / ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: zla ba dang po de nyid kyi nyin mo'i chu tshod ni bzhi dang bcu gnyis bsgyur zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zla ba dang po de nyid kyi nyin mo'i chu tshod ni bzhi dang bcu gnyis bsgyur zhes bya ba la /
translated: The hours of the day in that first month are four times twelve.

original: bcu phrag gnyis dang bzhi ste nyi shu rtsa bzhir brtsi'o //
analyzed: bcu phrag gnyis dang bzhi ste nyi shu rtsa bzhir brtsi'o //
translated: That is, twenty-four times ten.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: dbus kyi bi shu gnyi gar sbyar //
analyzed: dbus kyi bi shu gnyi gar sbyar //
translated: The two Vishus in the middle are applied.

original: zhes bya ba ni dpyid zla 'bring po zla ba'i mgo la nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i chu tshod mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpyid zla 'bring po zla ba'i mgo la nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i chu tshod mnyam pa'o //
translated: The middle month of spring, the head of the month, has equal hours of day and night.

original: de bzhin du pi shu gnyis pa yang /
analyzed: de bzhin du pi shu gnyis pa yang /
translated: Similarly, the second Vishu

original: dgun zla 'bring po'i dang po la nyin mo dang mtshan mo mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: dgun zla 'bring po'i dang po la nyin mo dang mtshan mo mnyam pa'o //
translated: In the first month of winter, day and night are of equal length.

original: chu tshod gcig gi dbugs kyi grangs kyi nges pa bstan pa'i phyir sum brgya drug cu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: chu tshod gcig gi dbugs kyi grangs kyi nges pa bstan pa'i phyir sum brgya drug cu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: To indicate the number of breaths in one hour, he says, ‚Äúthree hundred and sixty, etc.‚Äù

original: dbugs 'byung ba drug cu dang bcas pa'i sum brgya'o //
analyzed: dbugs 'byung ba drug cu dang bcas pa'i sum brgya'o //
translated: Three hundred is together with sixty breaths.

original: dus rnams 'da' zhes bya ba ni chu tshod gcig la ji lta ba bzhin du nyin mtshan gyi chu tshod drug cu po gzhan dag la yang de ltar sbyar ba'i don to //
analyzed: dus rnams 'da' zhes bya ba ni chu tshod gcig la ji lta ba bzhin du nyin mtshan gyi chu tshod drug cu po gzhan dag la yang de ltar sbyar ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúPassing through the hours‚Äù means that just as it is in one hour, so it is in the other sixty hours of day and night.

original: chu tshod dbugs ni rdzogs dang po //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: chu tshod dbugs ni rdzogs dang po // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The first complete breath in an hour isüîΩthe first of the breaths that are exhaled and inhaled.

original: chu tshod kyi @69b dbugs rdzogs pa ni grangs ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: chu tshod kyi @69b dbugs rdzogs pa ni grangs ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
translated: The complete number of breaths in an hour is just as it is.

original: de nyid rim gyis 'phel ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid rim gyis 'phel ba yin no //
translated: That itself increases gradually.

original: dang bo ni mchog ste dge ba'i mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: dang bo ni mchog ste dge ba'i mtshan ma'o //
translated: The first is the best, the sign of virtue.

original: rim gyis 'bri ba ni de las bzlog pa ste /
analyzed: rim gyis 'bri ba ni de las bzlog pa ste /
translated: The gradual decrease is the opposite of that.

original: dbugs ji skad smos ba las bri zhing 'chad pa yin no //
analyzed: dbugs ji skad smos ba las bri zhing 'chad pa yin no //
translated: The breaths decrease and diminish from what has been stated.

original: las dang las min zhes bya ba ni srog gnas pa dang 'gag pa'o //üîΩyang na rim gyis 'phel zhing 'bri //
analyzed: las dang las min zhes bya ba ni srog gnas pa dang 'gag pa'o // yang na rim gyis 'phel zhing 'bri //
translated: ‚ÄúAction and non-action‚Äù means the continuation and cessation of life.

original: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gnas pa las cig shos bri ba gang yin pa nyid cig shos 'phel ba ste //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gnas pa las cig shos bri ba gang yin pa nyid cig shos 'phel ba ste //
translated: ‚ÄúOr else, increasing and decreasing in sequence‚Äù means that whatever is increasing is decreasing for the other.

original: des las dang las min zhes bya ba dge ba dang sdig pa'i mtshan mar bya ba'o //
analyzed: des las dang las min zhes bya ba dge ba dang sdig pa'i mtshan mar bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that, action and non-action‚Äù means that virtue and sin are to be marked.

original: bye brag bzhin zhes pa ni tshes dang zla ba dang lo'i bye brag go //üîΩdbugs ni rim gyis gzung bar bya //
analyzed: bye brag bzhin zhes pa ni tshes dang zla ba dang lo'i bye brag go // dbugs ni rim gyis gzung bar bya //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the difference‚Äù means the difference of the day, month, and year.

original: zhes bya ba ni bye brag de dag gi go rim pa ji bzhin du gzung ba sto shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bye brag de dag gi go rim pa ji bzhin du gzung ba sto shes par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe breath is to be held in sequence‚Äù means that the holding should be known according to the sequence of those differences.

original: 'di dag ni 'og nas ston mod kyi 'dir cung zad cig brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'og nas ston mod kyi 'dir cung zad cig brjod par bya ste /
translated: These are taught below, but I will say a little about them here.

original: de la phan tshun du thig gnyis bris pas re'u mig dgur 'gyur la de nas yang mtshams kyi re'u mig bzhi la thig re re bris pas re'u mig bcu gsum du bya'o //
analyzed: de la phan tshun du thig gnyis bris pas re'u mig dgur 'gyur la de nas yang mtshams kyi re'u mig bzhi la thig re re bris pas re'u mig bcu gsum du bya'o //
translated: There, two lines are drawn crossing each other, making nine squares. Then, four lines are drawn in the squares of the four directions, making thirteen squares.

original: de nas phyi rol kun du bskor bas 'khor lo rim pa gsum du byas la de las phyi rol gyi rim pa'i re'u mig dang bo la grangs lnga'i mtshan ma bri'o //
analyzed: de nas phyi rol kun du bskor bas 'khor lo rim pa gsum du byas la de las phyi rol gyi rim pa'i re'u mig dang bo la grangs lnga'i mtshan ma bri'o //
translated: Then, having gone around the outside, one should make three layers of the wheel. In the first square outside of that, one should write the signs of the five numbers.

original: gnyis pa la ni bcu'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa la ni bcu'o //
translated: In the second, ten.

original: gsum pa la ni bco lnga'o //
analyzed: gsum pa la ni bco lnga'o //
translated: In the third, fifteen.

original: bzhi pa la ni nyi shu'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa la ni nyi shu'o //
translated: In the fourth, twenty.

original: lnga pa la ni shu rtsa lnga'o //
analyzed: lnga pa la ni shu rtsa lnga'o //
translated: In the fifth, twenty-five.

original: drug pa la ni nyi shu rtsa drug go //
analyzed: drug pa la ni nyi shu rtsa drug go //
translated: In the sixth, twenty-six.

original: bdun pa la ni nyi shu rtsa bdun no //
analyzed: bdun pa la ni nyi shu rtsa bdun no //
translated: In the seventh, twenty-seven.

original: brgyad pa la ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
analyzed: brgyad pa la ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
translated: In the eighth, twenty-eight.

original: dgu pa la yang rtsa dgu'o //
analyzed: dgu pa la yang rtsa dgu'o //
translated: In the ninth, twenty-nine.

original: bcu pa la ni sum cu'o //
analyzed: bcu pa la ni sum cu'o //
translated: In the tenth, thirty.

original: bcu gcig pa la ni sum cu rtsa gcig go //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa la ni sum cu rtsa gcig go //
translated: In the eleventh, thirty-one.

original: bcu gnyis pa la ni sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la ni sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: In the twelfth, thirty-two.

original: dbus su ni sum cu gsum mo //
analyzed: dbus su ni sum cu gsum mo //
translated: In the center, thirty-three.

original: rim pa gnyis pa'i re'u cha dang po la gsum mo //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis pa'i re'u cha dang po la gsum mo //
translated: In the first square of the second layer, three.

original: gnyis pa la gnyis so //
analyzed: gnyis pa la gnyis so //
translated: In the second, two.

original: gsum pa la gcig go //
analyzed: gsum pa la gcig go //
translated: In the third, one.

original: bzhi pa la drug go //
analyzed: bzhi pa la drug go //
translated: In the fourth, six.

original: lnga pa la yang gsum mo //
analyzed: lnga pa la yang gsum mo //
translated: In the fifth, three.

original: drug pa la yang gnyis so //
analyzed: drug pa la yang gnyis so //
translated: In the sixth, two.

original: bdun pa la yang gcig go //
analyzed: bdun pa la yang gcig go //
translated: On the seventh, one day.

original: brgyad pa la yang bco lnga'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa la yang bco lnga'o //
translated: On the eighth, fifteen days.

original: dgu pa la yang bcu'o //
analyzed: dgu pa la yang bcu'o //
translated: On the ninth, ten days.

original: bcu pa la lnga'o //
analyzed: bcu pa la lnga'o //
translated: On the tenth, five days.

original: bcu gcig pa la yang gsum mo //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa la yang gsum mo //
translated: On the eleventh, three days.

original: bcu gnyis pa la yang gnyis so //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la yang gnyis so //
translated: On the twelfth, two days.

original: dbus su ni gcig go //
analyzed: dbus su ni gcig go //
translated: In the middle, one day.

original: de la nyi ma lngar rlung phyin ci log tu rgyun lo gsum na 'chi'o //
analyzed: de la nyi ma lngar rlung phyin ci log tu rgyun lo gsum na 'chi'o //
translated: If the wind moves in the opposite direction for five days, death will occur in three years.

original: de bzhin du nyi ma @70a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du nyi ma @70a * //
translated: Similarly,

original: bcus ni lo gnyis na 'chi'o //
analyzed: bcus ni lo gnyis na 'chi'o //
translated: with ten days, death will occur in two years.

original: nyi ma bco lngas ni lo gcig na 'chi'o //
analyzed: nyi ma bco lngas ni lo gcig na 'chi'o //
translated: With fifteen days, death will occur in one year.

original: nyi ma nyi shus ni zla ba drug na 'chi'o //
analyzed: nyi ma nyi shus ni zla ba drug na 'chi'o //
translated: With twenty days, death will occur in six months.

original: nyi ma nyi shu rtsa lngas ni zla ba gsum gyis 'chi'o //
analyzed: nyi ma nyi shu rtsa lngas ni zla ba gsum gyis 'chi'o //
translated: With twenty-five days, death will occur in three months.

original: nyi ma nyi shu drug gis ni zla ba gnyis kyis 'chi'o //
analyzed: nyi ma nyi shu drug gis ni zla ba gnyis kyis 'chi'o //
translated: With twenty-six days, death will occur in two months.

original: nyi ma nyi shu bdun gyis ni zla gcig na 'chi'o //
analyzed: nyi ma nyi shu bdun gyis ni zla gcig na 'chi'o //
translated: With twenty-seven days, death will occur in one month.

original: nyi ma nyi shu brgyad kyis ni zla ba phyed kyis 'chi'o //
analyzed: nyi ma nyi shu brgyad kyis ni zla ba phyed kyis 'chi'o //
translated: With twenty-eight days, death will occur in a half month.

original: nyi ma nyi shu dgu yis ni nyi ma cu yis 'chi'o //
analyzed: nyi ma nyi shu dgu yis ni nyi ma cu yis 'chi'o //
translated: With twenty-nine days, death will occur in ten days.

original: nyi ma sum cus ni nyi ma ldan 'chi'o //
analyzed: nyi ma sum cus ni nyi ma ldan 'chi'o //
translated: With thirty days, death will occur in seven days.

original: nyi ma sum cu gcig gis ni nyi ma gsum na 'chi'o //
analyzed: nyi ma sum cu gcig gis ni nyi ma gsum na 'chi'o //
translated: By thirty-one days, [death] is in three days.

original: nyi ma sum cu gnyis kyis ni nyi ma gnyis na 'chi'o //
analyzed: nyi ma sum cu gnyis kyis ni nyi ma gnyis na 'chi'o //
translated: By thirty-two days, [death] is in two days.

original: nyi ma sum cu gsum gyis ni nyi ma gcig na ste /
analyzed: nyi ma sum cu gsum gyis ni nyi ma gcig na ste /
translated: By thirty-three days, [death] is in one day.

original: 'di dag gi don yang lnga dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'og nas stan pas der shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag gi don yang lnga dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'og nas stan pas der shes par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of these [days] will be taught below by five, etc. and should be understood there.

original: bar bar gyi nyi ma dag kyang de nyid du blta'o //
analyzed: bar bar gyi nyi ma dag kyang de nyid du blta'o //
translated: The intermediate days should be seen in that [same place].

original: da ni lo'i dbugs la sogs pa'i grangs kyi nges pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni lo'i dbugs la sogs pa'i grangs kyi nges pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the number of breaths in a year, etc. is stated:

original: mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: dakini and so on.

original: kha zhes pa ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: kha zhes pa ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: Kha is twenty-four.

original: ga zhes bya ba ni drug phrag gnyis kyis so //
analyzed: ga zhes bya ba ni drug phrag gnyis kyis so //
translated: Ga is by two groups of six.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: dus tshigs gnyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dus tshigs gnyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Two seasons means

original: dus drug po gnyis su bya ba'o //
analyzed: dus drug po gnyis su bya ba'o //
translated: the six times are made into two.

original: de dag ni nyi shu rtsa zhi dang drug phrag gnyis kyi mtshan ma bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag ni nyi shu rtsa zhi dang drug phrag gnyis kyi mtshan ma bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Those are the signs of twenty-four and two groups of six.

original: bgrod pa gnyis kyis mtshon par bya //
analyzed: bgrod pa gnyis kyis mtshon par bya //
translated: Should be indicated by two traversals.

original: zhes bya ba ni nyi shu bzhi pa dang / drug phrag gnyis kyi mtshan ma dag gcig tu bsres te sum cu rtsa drug gi mtshan ma bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyi shu bzhi pa dang / drug phrag gnyis kyi mtshan ma dag gcig tu bsres te sum cu rtsa drug gi mtshan ma bya ba'o //
translated: The signs of two groups of six are combined into one, and the signs of thirty-six are made.

original: gnyis po zhes bya ba ni de yang slar bco brgyad pa phrag gnyis su bgos te mtshan ma bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis po zhes bya ba ni de yang slar bco brgyad pa phrag gnyis su bgos te mtshan ma bya ba'o //
translated: The two are again divided into two groups of eighteen, and the signs are made.

original: bcu ru bsgyur zhes bya ba ni gnyis po de dag bcu bcur bsgyur ba brtsis te /
analyzed: bcu ru bsgyur zhes bya ba ni gnyis po de dag bcu bcur bsgyur ba brtsis te /
translated: The two are multiplied by ten, and the signs are made.

original: brgya brgya bcu phrag gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brgya brgya bcu phrag gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: One hundred and one hundred make two groups of one hundred.

original: de la brgya phrag gnyis gcig tu bsres te nyis brgya'i mtshan ma bya //
analyzed: de la brgya phrag gnyis gcig tu bsres te nyis brgya'i mtshan ma bya //
translated: Two groups of one hundred are combined into one, and the signs of two hundred are made.

original: bcu drug phrag brgyad pa gnyis las bcu'i mtshan ma dang drug gi mtshan ma so sor byas la bcu drug gi mtshan ma bya'o //
analyzed: bcu drug phrag brgyad pa gnyis las bcu'i mtshan ma dang drug gi mtshan ma so sor byas la bcu drug gi mtshan ma bya'o //
translated: From two groups of eight groups of sixteen, the signs of ten and the signs of six are made separately, and the signs of sixteen are made.

original: de'i rtsar thig le gnyis bzhag pas nyi khri chig stong drug brgyar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i rtsar thig le gnyis bzhag pas nyi khri chig stong drug brgyar 'gyur te /
translated: By placing two drops on that, it becomes twenty-one thousand six hundred,

original: lo'i chu tshod kyi grangs kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lo'i chu tshod kyi grangs kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: which are the signs of the number of hours in a year.

original: de'i mtshan ma de nyid kyis nyin mtshan gyi dbugs kyi grangs kyi mtshan ma yang bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i mtshan ma de nyid kyis nyin mtshan gyi dbugs kyi grangs kyi mtshan ma yang bstan pa yin te /
translated: The characteristics of the day and night breaths are also taught by those very characteristics.

original: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang drug brgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang drug brgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: They are 21,600.

original: ngag gi dbang phyug kun bzang nas //
analyzed: ngag gi dbang phyug kun bzang nas //
translated: The lord of speech is Samantabhadra.

original: zhes bya ba la 'dri ba bo'i @70b ngag gi yi ge'i grangs ji snyed yod pa'i mtshan ma bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'dri ba bo'i @70b ngag gi yi ge'i grangs ji snyed yod pa'i mtshan ma bya ba ste /
translated: The number of syllables of the speech of the one who is questioned is the characteristic of the syllables.

original: drug 'gyur du ni bzhag nas su //
analyzed: drug 'gyur du ni bzhag nas su //
translated: Having set them in six parts,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas 'byung ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas 'byung ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: and so on, is to be applied to what will be explained below.

original: des ni ngag gi yi ge de rnams drug 'gyur du bya ba ston to //üîΩlnga pa de ni sum 'gyur bya //
analyzed: des ni ngag gi yi ge de rnams drug 'gyur du bya ba ston to // lnga pa de ni sum 'gyur bya //
translated: That teaches that those syllables of speech are to be made into six parts.üîΩThe fifth is to be tripled.

original: zhes bya ba ni drug cha lnga po nyid sum 'gyur du bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni drug cha lnga po nyid sum 'gyur du bya ba'o //
translated: The very five parts are to be tripled.

original: sum brgya drug cus bsres nas su //
analyzed: sum brgya drug cus bsres nas su //
translated: Having mixed with 360,

original: zhes bya ba ni grangs de snyed lhag par bsnan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni grangs de snyed lhag par bsnan pa'o //
translated: that number is added in excess.

original: sa bzhin du ni bcad nas su //
analyzed: sa bzhin du ni bcad nas su //
translated: Having cut like the earth,

original: zhes bya ba ni grangs bcu gnyis bcu gnyis su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni grangs bcu gnyis bcu gnyis su bcad pa'o //
translated: the number is cut into twelve parts.

original: lhag ma bzung ba ni de'i lhag ma'i dbyangs kyi yi ge ste /
analyzed: lhag ma bzung ba ni de'i lhag ma'i dbyangs kyi yi ge ste /
translated: The remaining vowels are the remaining vowel letters.

original: de'i mtshan nyid ji skad smos pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid ji skad smos pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: They are to be arranged according to the previously stated rules.

original: yang na ngag gi dbang phyug de sum 'gyur du bya'i snga ma ltar drug 'gyur la sogs pa ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: yang na ngag gi dbang phyug de sum 'gyur du bya'i snga ma ltar drug 'gyur la sogs pa ni mi bya'o //
translated: Or else, the vowels are to be tripled, not sextetupled, etc., as before.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: drug 'gyur du bya ba ni bcu gnyis su bcad pa'i kha bskang ba'o //
analyzed: drug 'gyur du bya ba ni bcu gnyis su bcad pa'i kha bskang ba'o //
translated: The sextetupling is to be done by adding twelve.üîΩThe lord of the earth is to be placed everywhere.

original: sa'i dbang phyug kun du gzhag / ces bya ba la sa ni re'u mig bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: sa'i dbang phyug kun du gzhag / ces bya ba la sa ni re'u mig bcu gnyis so //
translated: The earth is the twelve squares.

original: dbang phyug ni aa la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis te de bri ba'o //üîΩde nyid kyis na /
analyzed: dbang phyug ni aa la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis te de bri ba'o // de nyid kyis na /
translated: The lord is the twelve vowel letters, a and so forth.

original: ma ning gnyis ni spangs nas su //
analyzed: ma ning gnyis ni spangs nas su //
translated: That is why it says, Having omitted the two neuters,

original: dbyangs kyi mtshan ma mngon par gzhag / ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: dbyangs kyi mtshan ma mngon par gzhag / ces bya ba ste /
translated: the signs of the vowels are to be placed.

original: ma ning ni ri r'i li l'i'o //
analyzed: ma ning ni ri r'i li l'i'o //
translated: The neuters are r, r, l, and l.

original: aa'i rim pa la 'bab nas //
analyzed: aa'i rim pa la 'bab nas //
translated: Having descended to the stage of a,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: etc. is easy to understand.

original: drug 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to /
analyzed: drug 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to /
translated: The sixfold and so on have been explained.

original: sa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni grangs bcu gnyis su'o //üîΩyang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni grangs bcu gnyis su'o // yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Like the earth means in the twelvefold enumeration.

original: rang gi lha'i sngags kyis thod lo kor la mngon par bzlas la glang gi gcin rjes lta bu'i rim mo ji tsam 'dod par sems kyis drangs la /
analyzed: rang gi lha'i sngags kyis thod lo kor la mngon par bzlas la glang gi gcin rjes lta bu'i rim mo ji tsam 'dod par sems kyis drangs la /
translated: Or else, etc. means: One should recite one's deity's mantra over the lampblack, and draw the picture with cow's urine to the extent one desires, in the form of a footprint.

original: ri mo de'i 'bur ba rnams su 'bur ba tha ma'i bar du brtsis te /
analyzed: ri mo de'i 'bur ba rnams su 'bur ba tha ma'i bar du brtsis te /
translated: One should count the bumps in the picture, up to the last bump.

original: dbyangs kyi yi ge'i grangs bzhin du tha ma de'i phan yon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi yi ge'i grangs bzhin du tha ma de'i phan yon du 'gyur ro //
translated: The benefit is that of the last vowel-syllable count.

original: yang na me tog ces bya ba la sogs pa la 'dri ba po'i lag pas me tog 'dor du bcug ste /
analyzed: yang na me tog ces bya ba la sogs pa la 'dri ba po'i lag pas me tog 'dor du bcug ste /
translated: Or else, etc. means: One should have the questioner cast a flower with his own hand.

original: me tog de dbyangs yig gi gnas su gang lhung ba de'i phan yon bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: me tog de dbyangs yig gi gnas su gang lhung ba de'i phan yon bstan par bya'o //
translated: The benefit should be taught of that on which the flower falls, in the place of the vowel-syllable.

original: yang na zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gzhan bstan pa ste /
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gzhan bstan pa ste /
translated: Or else, etc. means: another method is taught.

original: shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'phel ba la sogs pa'i dus gang la 'dri ba'i dus de nyid kyis sngar bstan pa'i tshul du dge sdig bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'phel ba la sogs pa'i dus gang la 'dri ba'i dus de nyid kyis sngar bstan pa'i tshul du dge sdig bstan par bya'o //
translated: The yogi who is well equipoised should indicate the virtue and non-virtue by the time of the question, such as the time of increase, etc., in the manner previously indicated.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From where?

original: rnal 'byor bstan bcos las te sngags kyi tshul rab tu rgyas @71a * //üîΩpa las so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bstan bcos las te sngags kyi tshul rab tu rgyas @71a * // pa las so //
translated: From the Yogatantra, the extensive way of the mantra.

original: snga dro zhes bya ba ni sngar thal ba'i phyi rol gyi mtshan mas brtsis pa thams cad snga dro'i chu tshod gsum gyi dus su brtsi'o //
analyzed: snga dro zhes bya ba ni sngar thal ba'i phyi rol gyi mtshan mas brtsis pa thams cad snga dro'i chu tshod gsum gyi dus su brtsi'o //
translated: Morning is the time of the three hours of the morning, calculated by the external signs previously mentioned.

original: rtsi ba po zhes bya ba ni rtsis mkhan gyis so //
analyzed: rtsi ba po zhes bya ba ni rtsis mkhan gyis so //
translated: The calculator is the astrologer.

original: sems ni bskyed pa'i cho ga bshad //
analyzed: sems ni bskyed pa'i cho ga bshad //
translated: The rite of generating the mind is explained.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa la sems bskyed pa ni sems rgyu ba'i bye brag go //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa la sems bskyed pa ni sems rgyu ba'i bye brag go //
translated: The generation of the mind is a particular movement of the mind.

original: de'i cho ga ni gnas bcu gnyis su lag pas reg pa'i bye brag gis de'i sems kyi rgyu ba shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i cho ga ni gnas bcu gnyis su lag pas reg pa'i bye brag gis de'i sems kyi rgyu ba shes par bya ba'o //
translated: The rite of that is the knowledge of the movement of that mind by the particular touching with the hand in the twelve places.

original: ro hi ta'i dus zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: ro hi ta'i dus zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: The time of Rohita, etc.

original: yang ro hi ta la sogs pa'i dus gang la 'dri ba des snga ma bzhin sems kyi dge sdig shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yang ro hi ta la sogs pa'i dus gang la 'dri ba des snga ma bzhin sems kyi dge sdig shes par bya'o //
translated: Also, one should know the good and bad of the mind in the past, as before, in whatever time, such as Rohi·πáƒ´, is asked about.

original: 'phel ba nor rgyas bu yin te //
analyzed: 'phel ba nor rgyas bu yin te //
translated: Increase is the son of VƒÅsuki.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so on.

original: nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa 'phel ba la sogs pa'i sgras shes par bya'o //
analyzed: nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa 'phel ba la sogs pa'i sgras shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know increase and so on by the words increase and so on, such as the son of VƒÅsuki.

original: lo'i gnas zhes bya ba ni zla ba bcu gnyis te de dag kyang de'i brdas bstan pa'o //
analyzed: lo'i gnas zhes bya ba ni zla ba bcu gnyis te de dag kyang de'i brdas bstan pa'o //
translated: The place of the year is the twelve months, and they are indicated by that sign.

original: rten 'brel bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rten 'brel bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The twelve links of dependent origination are ignorance and so on.

original: de dag kyang de'i rang bzhin gyis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang de'i rang bzhin gyis shes par bya'o //
translated: And they should be known by their nature.

original: de ltar sa rnams zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa ltar sa rnams dang rim bzhin sbyar ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar sa rnams zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa ltar sa rnams dang rim bzhin sbyar ba ste /
translated: Thus, the stages are as previously explained, and they are to be applied in order.

original: mos pa spyod pa'i sa ni 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: mos pa spyod pa'i sa ni 'phel ba'o //
translated: The stage of practice through belief is increase.

original: rab tu dga' ba ni gti mug go //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba ni gti mug go //
translated: The Joyful is delusion.

original: dri ma med pa ni bzang po'o //üîΩ'od byed pa ni khyu mchog go //
analyzed: dri ma med pa ni bzang po'o // 'od byed pa ni khyu mchog go //
translated: The Stainless is good.üîΩThe Radiant is the bull.

original: 'od 'phro ba can ni rus sbal lo //
analyzed: 'od 'phro ba can ni rus sbal lo //
translated: The Blazing is the tortoise.

original: shin tu spyad dka' ba ni chu srin no //
analyzed: shin tu spyad dka' ba ni chu srin no //
translated: The crocodile is very difficult to practice.

original: mngon du gyur pa ni yugs sa mo'o //
analyzed: mngon du gyur pa ni yugs sa mo'o //
translated: The widow is manifest.

original: ring du song ba ni sme ba'o //
analyzed: ring du song ba ni sme ba'o //
translated: The mole is far gone.

original: mi g-yo ba ni 'bugs pa'o //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba ni 'bugs pa'o //
translated: The cave is immovable.

original: legs pa'i blo gros ni khyu mchog go //
analyzed: legs pa'i blo gros ni khyu mchog go //
translated: The bull is excellent intelligence.

original: chos kyi sprin ni rmi lam mo //
analyzed: chos kyi sprin ni rmi lam mo //
translated: The dream is the cloud of Dharma.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sa ni 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sa ni 'dod pa'o //
translated: The desire is the stage of Buddha.

original: dge dang mi dge brtag par bya //
analyzed: dge dang mi dge brtag par bya //
translated: One should examine virtue and nonvirtue.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar pho nya gnas gang dang gang du reg pa las nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa'i dug gis zin pa gsor rung ba dang / mi rung ba bstan pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar pho nya gnas gang dang gang du reg pa las nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa'i dug gis zin pa gsor rung ba dang / mi rung ba bstan pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Thus, in whatever place the messenger touches, it shows whether the one bitten by the poison of Manibhadra and so forth can be cured or not.

original: de nas dus su bgrod pa ni //
analyzed: de nas dus su bgrod pa ni //
translated: Then, the crossing at the right time

original: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i dus shes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i dus shes pa'o //
translated: is the knowledge of the time of joy and so forth.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That itself is stated:

original: dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Joy and so forth.

original: dga' ba ni cung zad bde ba dga' ba ste //
analyzed: dga' ba ni cung zad bde ba dga' ba ste //
translated: Joy is a little bliss.üîΩSupreme joy is beyond that.

original: mchog tu dga' ba de las lhag / khyad par dga' ba shin tu chags /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba de las lhag / khyad par dga' ba shin tu chags /
translated: Special joy is very attached.

original: lhag ma lhan cig skyes dga' ba //
analyzed: lhag ma lhan cig skyes dga' ba //
translated: The rest is the innate joy.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don gyis bla mas bstan pa las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don gyis bla mas bstan pa las shes par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of this verse should be understood from the teacher.

original: skad cig nyid ces @71b bya ba yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par 'joms pa dang / rnam pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skad cig go //
analyzed: skad cig nyid ces @71b bya ba yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par 'joms pa dang / rnam pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skad cig go //
translated: The word moment refers to the various moments of the cause, the moments of maturation, the moments of destruction, and the moments of characteristics.

original: 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni rgyu mthun pa dang / rnam par smin pa dang / skyes bu byed pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni rgyu mthun pa dang / rnam par smin pa dang / skyes bu byed pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The word effect refers to the homogeneous effect, the effect of maturation, and the effect of human action.

original: yan lag ni rnal 'byor dang / rjes su rnal 'byor dang / shin tu rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor chen po rnams dang / bsnyen pa dang / nye ba'i bsnyen pa dang / sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po rnams so //
analyzed: yan lag ni rnal 'byor dang / rjes su rnal 'byor dang / shin tu rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor chen po rnams dang / bsnyen pa dang / nye ba'i bsnyen pa dang / sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po rnams so //
translated: The limbs are the yoga, the subsequent yoga, the great yoga, the service, the close service, the accomplishment, and the great accomplishment.

original: sum 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sum 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The word tripling refers to the tripling of the body, speech, and mind.

original: snying stobs dang / rdul dang mun pa rnams te de thams cad dga' ba la sogs pa gsum po rnams des rnam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: snying stobs dang / rdul dang mun pa rnams te de thams cad dga' ba la sogs pa gsum po rnams des rnam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: The three, sattva, rajas, and tamas, are all established by those three, beginning with joy.

original: kun la rkang pa bzhi yis dgang //
analyzed: kun la rkang pa bzhi yis dgang //
translated: All are filled by four parts.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: rkang pa zhes bya ba ni cha shas bzhi pa ste /üîΩlhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: rkang pa zhes bya ba ni cha shas bzhi pa ste / lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: part means a fourth part.

original: dgang ba ni rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: dgang ba ni rdzogs pa ste /
translated: Filling means completion.

original: dga' ba gsum gyis rim gyis 'bras bur gyur pa'i lhan cig skyes pa skye ba'i mthar thug cing rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba gsum gyis rim gyis 'bras bur gyur pa'i lhan cig skyes pa skye ba'i mthar thug cing rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The three joys are the completion and culmination of the arising of the connate [joy] in stages.

original: mdud pa zhes bya ba ni rlung 'phro ba'i smin ma'i dbus kyi rtsa'o //
analyzed: mdud pa zhes bya ba ni rlung 'phro ba'i smin ma'i dbus kyi rtsa'o //
translated: Knot is the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ in the middle of the eyebrows, where the vƒÅyu moves.

original: bcad pa zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'o //
analyzed: bcad pa zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'o //
translated: Cutting is clarity.

original: 'char ba zhes bya ba ni rlung 'pho ba nyid do //üîΩdus ni de ltar brjod pa yin //
analyzed: 'char ba zhes bya ba ni rlung 'pho ba nyid do // dus ni de ltar brjod pa yin //
translated: Arising is the movement of the vƒÅyu.

original: zhes bya ba la //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la //
translated: That is said to be the time.

original: dus ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i skad cig mas rtsa gsal bar gyur cing rlung 'pho bar gyur pa de'i tshe de ltar zhes bya ba dga' ba rnams 'char ba yin no //
analyzed: dus ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i skad cig mas rtsa gsal bar gyur cing rlung 'pho bar gyur pa de'i tshe de ltar zhes bya ba dga' ba rnams 'char ba yin no //
translated: When time is clarified by the various moments, and the winds move, then the joys arise in that way.

original: brjod pa yin zhes bya ba ni zhar la 'ongs pa de dag bstan to zhes bya bar blta'o //
analyzed: brjod pa yin zhes bya ba ni zhar la 'ongs pa de dag bstan to zhes bya bar blta'o //
translated: The expression is indicates that those [joys] are taught as a digression.

original: 'phel ba la sogs pa'i dus su bya ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir chad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te chad pa ni rgyal po la sogs pa'i chad pas gzir zhing 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: 'phel ba la sogs pa'i dus su bya ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir chad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te chad pa ni rgyal po la sogs pa'i chad pas gzir zhing 'dul ba'o //
translated: In order to teach the special activities at the time of increase, etc., [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, punishment, etc. Punishment is being oppressed and disciplined by the punishment of a king, etc.

original: bgegs ni tshogs bdag ste gdon gyi bye brag go //
analyzed: bgegs ni tshogs bdag ste gdon gyi bye brag go //
translated: Obstruction is Ga·πáe≈õa, a particular ghost.

original: gza' ni nyi ma la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gza' ni nyi ma la sogs pa ste /
translated: Planet is the sun, etc.

original: de rnams kyi gnod pa bzlog pa la 'phel ba la sogs pa'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma bltas nas cho ga sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gnod pa bzlog pa la 'phel ba la sogs pa'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma bltas nas cho ga sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In order to avert the harm of those [planets], one should apply the rites after observing the auspicious and inauspicious signs of increase, etc.

original: mdung zhes bya ba ni gzir ba'o //
analyzed: mdung zhes bya ba ni gzir ba'o //
translated: Spear is piercing.

original: dgra rnams ltung ba zhes bya ba ni sma dbab pa'o //
analyzed: dgra rnams ltung ba zhes bya ba ni sma dbab pa'o //
translated: The downfall of enemies is the humiliation of enemies.

original: khyim sa'i dpyad ni khyim rtsom pa ste /
analyzed: khyim sa'i dpyad ni khyim rtsom pa ste /
translated: The examination of land is the examination of land for the construction of a house.

original: nye bar mtshon pa'i don gyis na gtsug lag khang la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: nye bar mtshon pa'i don gyis na gtsug lag khang la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: By the meaning of examination, a temple and so on are also included.

original: lto 'phye'i ltor brko ba ni sa brko ba ste /
analyzed: lto 'phye'i ltor brko ba ni sa brko ba ste /
translated: The digging of a mole-hill is the digging of the earth.

original: rdzing dang khron pa la sogs pa byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdzing dang khron pa la sogs pa byed pa'o //
translated: It is the making of a pond, a well, and so on.

original: 'gro 'ong ni mgron du @72a * //
analyzed: 'gro 'ong ni mgron du @72a * //
translated: The coming and going is the going and coming of guests.

original: 'gro ba'o // sbyor ba ni sman sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'o // sbyor ba ni sman sbyor ba'o //
translated: The application is the application of medicine.

original: bye brag ni nor bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: bye brag ni nor bsgrub pa'o //
translated: The distinction is the accomplishment of wealth.

original: tshe dang nad med spel ba ni chu'i sbyin sreg la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: tshe dang nad med spel ba ni chu'i sbyin sreg la sogs pa'o //
translated: The increase of life and health is the water offering and so on.

original: sa bon gdab pa ni shing dang 'bru la sogs pa'i sa bon gyi tshogs gzugs pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon gdab pa ni shing dang 'bru la sogs pa'i sa bon gyi tshogs gzugs pa'o //
translated: The sowing of seeds is the planting of seeds of trees, grains, and so on.

original: phyugs 'dul ba ni bla ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa la gnod pa byed pa rnams tshar gcad pa'o //üîΩ'bral dang 'du zhes bya ba ni sod ba slar dgug pa ste /
analyzed: phyugs 'dul ba ni bla ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa la gnod pa byed pa rnams tshar gcad pa'o // 'bral dang 'du zhes bya ba ni sod ba slar dgug pa ste /
translated: The taming of cattle is the subduing of those who harm the guru, the Buddha, and so on.üîΩThe separation and gathering is the killing and summoning back of the dead.

original: shi ba rnams slar gso zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shi ba rnams slar gso zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It means the reviving of the dead.

original: rgyal srid ni rgyal thabs la dgod pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal srid ni rgyal thabs la dgod pa'o //
translated: The kingdom is the establishment of the royal power.

original: rnyed pa spang ba ni tha ma la pa'i rgyu ba dgag pa'o //
analyzed: rnyed pa spang ba ni tha ma la pa'i rgyu ba dgag pa'o //
translated: The abandonment of gain is the cessation of the movement of the last.

original: des ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: des ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What is the use of that?

original: yid las byung ba dang / zhes bya ba la yid kyis 'byung ba ni yid las 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: yid las byung ba dang / zhes bya ba la yid kyis 'byung ba ni yid las 'byung ba ste /
translated: The mental is the mental creation.

original: ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: It is concentration.

original: 'dir drug pa mi mngon pa dang / ma ning gi rtags su bya ba ni lung gi don to //
analyzed: 'dir drug pa mi mngon pa dang / ma ning gi rtags su bya ba ni lung gi don to //
translated: Here, the sixth and the neuter are to be taken as the signs of the injunction.

original: g-yul 'gyed pa ni grags par zad do //
analyzed: g-yul 'gyed pa ni grags par zad do //
translated: The battle is well known.

original: sdong po'i phung po ni gter brko ba la sogs pa'i sdong bu nyid do //
analyzed: sdong po'i phung po ni gter brko ba la sogs pa'i sdong bu nyid do //
translated: The trunk-heap is the trunk itself of digging for treasure, etc.

original: dus dang tshod la sogs pa nyid //
analyzed: dus dang tshod la sogs pa nyid //
translated: The time, the measure, etc.

original: ces bya ba la dus ni dus min no //
analyzed: ces bya ba la dus ni dus min no //
translated: The time is the untimely.

original: tshod ni drod do //
analyzed: tshod ni drod do //
translated: The measure is the heat.

original: de dag thams cad ces bya ba ni 'phel ba la sogs pa'i dus kyi bye brag gi bya bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag thams cad ces bya ba ni 'phel ba la sogs pa'i dus kyi bye brag gi bya bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: All of those is taught for the sake of the distinctions of the time of increase, etc.

original: nyin dang nyin gyis dbye bar bya //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: nyin dang nyin gyis dbye bar bya //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
translated: One should divide by the day.

original: 'phel ba la sogs pa'i dus tshod de dang de la bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'phel ba la sogs pa'i dus tshod de dang de la bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should do this at such and such a time, such as the time of increase.

original: bcud kyis len dang rtsi rnams gnyis //
analyzed: bcud kyis len dang rtsi rnams gnyis //
translated: The two, alchemical elixirs and ointments,

original: zhes bya ba la bcud kyis len ni lus dang tshe 'phel bar byed pa'i sman no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la bcud kyis len ni lus dang tshe 'phel bar byed pa'i sman no //
translated: An alchemical elixir is a medicine that increases the body and life.

original: rtsi rnam pa gnyis ni rtsi rnam gnyis te bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: rtsi rnam pa gnyis ni rtsi rnam gnyis te bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: The two kinds of ointments are the two kinds of ointments.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: las ni yongs su smin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: las ni yongs su smin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because of the ripening of karma,

original: thar pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thar pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of attaining liberation.

original: gnyis po de ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: gnyis po de ci zhig ce na /
translated: What are those two?

original: sems 'phel mnyam par 'jug pa yis //
analyzed: sems 'phel mnyam par 'jug pa yis //
translated: By the increase and even flow of mind,

original: zhes bya ba la sems 'phel ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sems 'phel ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: The increase of mind is an illustration.

original: lus 'phel ba'ang gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: lus 'phel ba'ang gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The increase of the body should also be taken.

original: 'phel ba ni rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: 'phel ba ni rgyas pa'o //
translated: Increase means expansion.

original: mnyam par 'jug pa ni gang du gcig tu 'dres pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam par 'jug pa ni gang du gcig tu 'dres pa'o //
translated: Even flow is where it is mixed as one.

original: de la sems 'phal ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin la lus 'phel ba ni srid pa yin no //
analyzed: de la sems 'phal ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin la lus 'phel ba ni srid pa yin no //
translated: There, the increase of mind is nirvana, and the increase of the body is existence.

original: blo ldan zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i blo dang ldan pas te /
analyzed: blo ldan zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i blo dang ldan pas te /
translated: The ‚Äúwise one‚Äù is one endowed with nondual intuition,

original: des rtsi rnam pa gnyis sbyar bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des rtsi rnam pa gnyis sbyar bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: and by that one the two kinds of breath control are to be practiced.

original: dbugs brtsi ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dbugs brtsi ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The chapter on breath control, etc.

original: dbugs brtsi ba ni dbugs kyi rgyu ba bgrang ba'o //
analyzed: dbugs brtsi ba ni dbugs kyi rgyu ba bgrang ba'o //
translated: Breath control is the counting of the breath‚Äôs movement.

original: de @72b gzhung gang du 'byung ba de ni dbugs brtsi ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o //
analyzed: de @72b gzhung gang du 'byung ba de ni dbugs brtsi ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o //
translated: The chapter in which it occurs is the eleventh chapter, called ‚ÄúBreath Control.‚Äù

original: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par bshad pa las le'u bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par bshad pa las le'u bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the eleventh chapter in the commentary on the great king of tantras, the glorious Vajra ·∏åƒÅka.üîΩThe explanation of the twelfth chapter, the chapter on subtle yogaüîΩThe explanation of the twelfth chapter, the chapter on subtle yoga

original: // / phra mo'i rnal 'byor ma gtogs par rags pas don mi 'grub pas phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan par bya ba'i phyir le'u bcu gcig pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / phra mo'i rnal 'byor ma gtogs par rags pas don mi 'grub pas phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan par bya ba'i phyir le'u bcu gcig pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to teach the subtle yoga, since the gross yoga does not accomplish the goal, the twelfth chapter is begun.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas zhes bya ba de ni rags pa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'i 'og tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas zhes bya ba de ni rags pa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'i 'og tu'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThen,‚Äù etc. ‚ÄúThen‚Äù means after the teaching of the gross yoga.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i don te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i don te /
translated: Therefore has the sense of cause.

original: gang gi phyir phra mo ma gtogs par rags pas mi 'grub pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir phra mo ma gtogs par rags pas mi 'grub pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not established by the coarse except for the subtle, therefore.

original: yang dag bshad par bya zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo dang sa bon la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams yang dag pa ste so sor phye nas bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag bshad par bya zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo dang sa bon la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams yang dag pa ste so sor phye nas bshad par bya'o //
translated: It should be explained correctly means that the forms of wheels, seeds, and so on should be explained correctly, that is, individually.

original: dngos grub mchog gi rigs pa las //
analyzed: dngos grub mchog gi rigs pa las //
translated: From the reasoning of the supreme spiritual power,

original: zhes bya ba la dngos grub mchog ni sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la dngos grub mchog ni sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang ngo //
translated: the supreme spiritual power is the state of buddhahood.

original: de nyid ni rig par bya bas na rig pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni rig par bya bas na rig pa ste /
translated: That itself is to be known, therefore it is knowledge.

original: las su sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: las su sbyar ba'o //
translated: It is applied as the agent.

original: sgyu ma chen po zhes bya ba //üîΩzhes pa la rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu 'joms pas na sgyu ma ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma chen po zhes bya ba // zhes pa la rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu 'joms pas na sgyu ma ste /
translated: The great illusion

original: byed pa por sbyar ba yin no //
analyzed: byed pa por sbyar ba yin no //
translated: is applied as the agent.

original: chen po yang de nyid de rnam par rtog pa ma lus par 'phrog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chen po yang de nyid de rnam par rtog pa ma lus par 'phrog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the great one because it takes away all conceptual thoughts.

original: de ltar na sgyu ma yang yin la chen po yang yin bas na sgyu ma che ste rig pa zhes bya ba ni gsal bas na /
analyzed: de ltar na sgyu ma yang yin la chen po yang yin bas na sgyu ma che ste rig pa zhes bya ba ni gsal bas na /
translated: Thus, it is a great illusion, and because it is a great illusion, it is the knowledge called the Great Illusion.üîΩThe Great Illusion is knowledge,

original: sgyu ma chen po ste rig pa'o zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byas te /
analyzed: sgyu ma chen po ste rig pa'o zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byas te /
translated: it is made clear.

original: ming de skad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ming de skad ces bya ba'o //
translated: That is the name.

original: gsang ba chen po'i dbang phyug ste //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gsang ba chen po'i dbang phyug ste // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The Lord of the Great Secret

original: gsang ba chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: gsang ba chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang ngo //
translated: The Great Secret is the state of Buddhahood.

original: de'i dngos grub ster bas na de'i dbang phyug ste rig pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos grub ster bas na de'i dbang phyug ste rig pa'o //
translated: Since it bestows the power of that, it is the Lord of that, which is knowledge.

original: sems can thams cad 'dul mdzad gnyen //
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'dul mdzad gnyen //
translated: The Friend who tames all living beings

original: zhes bya ba la sems can thams cad ni seng ge dang 'phrog byed la sogs pa ste de rnams 'dul bar mdzad pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sems can thams cad ni seng ge dang 'phrog byed la sogs pa ste de rnams 'dul bar mdzad pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: All living beings are the lion, the thief, and so on. The one who tames them is called that.

original: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub nges par ster bas na gnyen no //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub nges par ster bas na gnyen no //
translated: Since it definitely bestows the desired power of body, speech, and mind, it is a friend.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: dbang phyug thams cad byed pa po //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: dbang phyug thams cad byed pa po //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
translated: The Lord of all powers, the creator

original: thams cad ces bya ba lha dang mi la sogs pa'i dbang phyug tu sgrub pa po byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba lha dang mi la sogs pa'i dbang phyug tu sgrub pa po byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the cause of the attainment of sovereignty over all means that it is the cause of the attainment of sovereignty over gods, humans, and so forth.

original: 'di ni rig pa chen po'i mchog / ces bya ba la 'di ni zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma chen po ste thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: 'di ni rig pa chen po'i mchog / ces bya ba la 'di ni zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma chen po ste thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: This is the supreme great knowledge means that this is the great illusion, which is the nature of method and wisdom.

original: @73a * // de nyid chen po ste rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid nyams su myong ba'i phyir rig pa'o //
analyzed: @73a * // de nyid chen po ste rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid nyams su myong ba'i phyir rig pa'o //
translated: It is the great reality, because it is the experience of perfect buddhahood. It is knowledge.

original: ci 'dra zhe na /
analyzed: ci 'dra zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: mchog ces bya ba ste de kho na nyid chen po phyin ci ma log pa ste de ngas bshad par bya zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ste de kho na nyid chen po phyin ci ma log pa ste de ngas bshad par bya zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: It is supreme, the unmistaken great reality. I will explain it.

original: de yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said:

original: skye bo yon tan ldan pa yis //
analyzed: skye bo yon tan ldan pa yis //
translated: The one who has good qualities

original: yon tan rnams ni shes par bya //
analyzed: yon tan rnams ni shes par bya //
translated: should know the good qualities.

original: gsol ba btab gang de nyid tshe //
analyzed: gsol ba btab gang de nyid tshe //
translated: When requested, at that time

original: phyin ci ma log de nyid gsungs //
analyzed: phyin ci ma log de nyid gsungs //
translated: the unmistaken reality is taught.

original: zhes so // bdag cag gis shes pa med par bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: zhes so // bdag cag gis shes pa med par bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to explain that we do not know, it says:üîΩDifficult to attain, merely nominal,

original: ming tsam mchog tu rnyed dka' ba //
analyzed: ming tsam mchog tu rnyed dka' ba //
translated: supreme,

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: This is the name of the knowledge,üîΩwhich is difficult to attain, even to hear, by the Sravakas, etc.

original: rig pa 'di'i ming tsam yang mchog tu ste nyan thos la sogs pas rnyed dka' ba ste dka' bas na rnyed dka' ba'am yang na mi rnyed pa yin no //
analyzed: rig pa 'di'i ming tsam yang mchog tu ste nyan thos la sogs pas rnyed dka' ba ste dka' bas na rnyed dka' ba'am yang na mi rnyed pa yin no //
translated: It is difficult to attain, or it is unattainable, because of its supreme nature.

original: des ni 'di skad du /
analyzed: des ni 'di skad du /
translated: This shows thatüîΩeven to hear its name, one must make a great effort.

original: 'di'i ming tsam yang thos pa yang 'bad pa drag po ma gtogs par rnyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
analyzed: 'di'i ming tsam yang thos pa yang 'bad pa drag po ma gtogs par rnyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
translated: Where it says,

original: gang du / dngos grub mchog gi rig pa ste //
analyzed: gang du / dngos grub mchog gi rig pa ste //
translated: the knowledge of the supreme power,

original: zhes 'byung ba der ni 'di byed pa po yin par sbyar te /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba der ni 'di byed pa po yin par sbyar te /
translated: there it is to be connected with the agent.üîΩThe knowledge endowed with the distinctions of the Great Illusion, etc.,üîΩis to be explained,

original: sgyu ma chen po la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i rig pa yang dag bshad par bya zhes bya ba dang sbyar te zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: sgyu ma chen po la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i rig pa yang dag bshad par bya zhes bya ba dang sbyar te zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed ces pa'i don to //
translated: is to be clarified.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: rig pa de 'dir yang sgyu ma chen po zhes gsungs la /
analyzed: rig pa de 'dir yang sgyu ma chen po zhes gsungs la /
translated: That knowledge is called the Great Illusion here,

original: gzhan dag tu ni gtum mo zhes pa bstan to //
analyzed: gzhan dag tu ni gtum mo zhes pa bstan to //
translated: and elsewhere it is taught as the fierce fire.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The first, etc.

original: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang du sna tshogs mdud pa'i 'char pa chen por padma'i sten du zla ba bsgom par bya zhes bya ba 'brel to //
analyzed: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang du sna tshogs mdud pa'i 'char pa chen por padma'i sten du zla ba bsgom par bya zhes bya ba 'brel to //
translated: It is connected with the statement that one should meditate on the moon in the center of the lotus in the great arising of the knot of the universe within the source of phenomena.

original: sna tshogs mdud pa zhes bya ba ni de'i dbus te /
analyzed: sna tshogs mdud pa zhes bya ba ni de'i dbus te /
translated: The knot of the universe is its center.

original: rtsa gcig po nyid kyi g-yas dang g-yon gyi cha gnyis su gyes pa las g-yas kyi cha na gnas pa ni g-yon nas bskor nas steng du rgyu la g-yon na gnas pa yang g-yas nas bskor nas steng du rgyu zhing /
analyzed: rtsa gcig po nyid kyi g-yas dang g-yon gyi cha gnyis su gyes pa las g-yas kyi cha na gnas pa ni g-yon nas bskor nas steng du rgyu la g-yon na gnas pa yang g-yas nas bskor nas steng du rgyu zhing /
translated: The single channel divides into two parts, right and left. The one that is located on the right side moves upward, turning to the left, and the one located on the left moves upward, turning to the right.

original: de bzhin du 'og tu rgyu ba gnyis kyang phan tshun bskor nas rgyu ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'og tu rgyu ba gnyis kyang phan tshun bskor nas rgyu ba ste /
translated: Similarly, the two that move downward also move, turning around each other.

original: de ltar kun du 'khyil pa'i rtsi'i gnas ni sna tshogs mdud pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar kun du 'khyil pa'i rtsi'i gnas ni sna tshogs mdud pa'o //
translated: The place of the channel that is coiled in this way is the knot of the universe.

original: de nyid 'char ba chen po ste sems can thams cad 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir 'char ba chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni yan lag la ming nye bar btags pas /
analyzed: de nyid 'char ba chen po ste sems can thams cad 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir 'char ba chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni yan lag la ming nye bar btags pas /
translated: That itself is the great arising, because it is the source of all sentient beings. The great arising is a nominal designation of a part.

original: skyes bu dang po'i mtshams sbyar ba skye /
analyzed: skyes bu dang po'i mtshams sbyar ba skye /
translated: The first person is connected with birth.

original: dper na nor bu la zla ba zhes bya ba @73b bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nor bu la zla ba zhes bya ba @73b bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the moon in a jewel.

original: de nas yi ge dgod ces bya ba la yi ge dgod pa ni sa bon gyi yi ge rnams nye bar gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: de nas yi ge dgod ces bya ba la yi ge dgod pa ni sa bon gyi yi ge rnams nye bar gzhag pa'o //
translated: Then, the arrangement of the syllables is the placement of the seed syllables.

original: brjod pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: brjod pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The expression is the retention of the various aspects.

original: dgod pa de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: dgod pa de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That arrangement is stated:

original: dbyangs yig dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dbyangs yig dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The first vowel, etc.

original: man ngag gis na zla tshes dang bcas pa'i dbyangs yig dang po dang thig le ste 'og nas 'byung ba'i bsgom par bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: man ngag gis na zla tshes dang bcas pa'i dbyangs yig dang po dang thig le ste 'og nas 'byung ba'i bsgom par bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: By the instruction, the first vowel with the crescent moon and the drop, which will occur below, is to be meditated upon.

original: gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gang du zhe na /
translated: Where?

original: padma'i steng du ste 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'i padma kha steng du blta bar ro //
analyzed: padma'i steng du ste 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'i padma kha steng du blta bar ro //
translated: On the lotus, on the lotus facing upward with sixty-four petals.

original: yang dag gnas zhes bya ba ni der yi ge steng du bltas te gnas pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag gnas zhes bya ba ni der yi ge steng du bltas te gnas pa'o //
translated: The correct placement is the placement of the syllable there facing upward.

original: rtag tu dbugs kyi ngo bo ste //
analyzed: rtag tu dbugs kyi ngo bo ste //
translated: Always the nature of the breath.

original: zhes bya ba ni dbugs steng du rgyu ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbugs steng du rgyu ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is the nature of the breath moving upward.

original: 'byung ba ru ni byed pa yin //
analyzed: 'byung ba ru ni byed pa yin //
translated: It is the agent of the arising.

original: zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi bshad pa ste sgyu ma chen po de nyid dbyangs yig dang po'i gzugs las me'i rang bzhin du 'bar te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi bshad pa ste sgyu ma chen po de nyid dbyangs yig dang po'i gzugs las me'i rang bzhin du 'bar te /
translated: This is the explanation of just that, the great illusion. Just that form of the first vowel arises in the nature of fire,

original: steng du 'bar zhing dbus phyir rgyu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: steng du 'bar zhing dbus phyir rgyu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it blazes upward and moves outward.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du'o //
translated: Always means for as long as one lives.

original: 'bar ba'i phreng bas mdzes pa'i mdog / ces bya ba la /
analyzed: 'bar ba'i phreng bas mdzes pa'i mdog / ces bya ba la /
translated: The color of a beautiful garland of flames.

original: 'bar ba'i phreng ba ni thig le las me lce'i tshogs 'bar bas 'ju bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i phreng ba ni thig le las me lce'i tshogs 'bar bas 'ju bar byed pa'o //
translated: A garland of flames is the blazing of a mass of tongues of flame from the bindu, which melts.

original: mdzes pa ni rno ba'o //
analyzed: mdzes pa ni rno ba'o //
translated: Beautiful is sharp.

original: mdog ni kha dog ste dkar po'o //
analyzed: mdog ni kha dog ste dkar po'o //
translated: Color is white.

original: de dag ni dbyangs yig dang po'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de dag ni dbyangs yig dang po'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: These are the characteristics of the first vowel.

original: zla ba'i dbus gnas bsgom par bya //
analyzed: zla ba'i dbus gnas bsgom par bya //
translated: One should meditate on the moon in the middle.

original: zhes bya ba la padma'i steng du zla ba'i dbus su dbyangs yig dang po zla tshes dang thig ler bcas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la padma'i steng du zla ba'i dbus su dbyangs yig dang po zla tshes dang thig ler bcas pa'o //
translated: On the lotus, in the middle of the moon, is the first vowel, along with the crescent moon and the drop.

original: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la ni zla ba la gnas par aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha rnams zla tshes dang thig le dang bcas par bsgom mo //
analyzed: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la ni zla ba la gnas par aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha rnams zla tshes dang thig le dang bcas par bsgom mo //
translated: On the petals in the east, etc., are the consonants a ka ca ·π≠a ta pa ya ≈õa, each standing on a moon, along with the crescent moon and the drop.

original: de ltar bkod pa dang 'og nas 'byung ba dag gis mdor bsdus te /
analyzed: de ltar bkod pa dang 'og nas 'byung ba dag gis mdor bsdus te /
translated: Thus, in brief, the arrangement of the vowels and consonants is as follows.

original: cir 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: cir 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: To show what the result of this is, it says:

original: kun du 'gro ba thob 'gyur ba //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: kun du 'gro ba thob 'gyur ba // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: One attains the state of omnipresence.

original: kun du 'gro ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: kun du 'gro ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
translated: Omnipresence is omniscience.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas ltar rnyed dka' //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas ltar rnyed dka' // zhes bya ba la /
translated: This is as hard to find as a buddha.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan 'di'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan 'di'o //
translated: This refers to this meditation.

original: rnyed dka' ba ni bskal pa mang pos kyang sangs rgyas ltar rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir ro //

translated: The Dharma is the grasping, the teaching of the going and coming of the light rays.

original: de ltar na rnal 'byor gang gis khyad par sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang dbyibs dang chos yin pa da la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na rnal 'byor gang gis khyad par sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang dbyibs dang chos yin pa da la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Thus, the yoga by which there is the distinction of the mantra, the mandala, the shape, and the Dharma, is called that.

original: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la //

original: bsten na myur du 'grub par 'gyur //üîΩshes rab thabs la sogs rnams kyis //

original: dga' dang bde bas 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: dga' dang bde bas 'grub par 'gyur //

original: zhes bya ba'i don 'dir bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don 'dir bstan pa'i phyir //

original: dug med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dug med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: srid pa'i longs spyod mchog 'dir bstan par bya //
analyzed: srid pa'i longs spyod mchog 'dir bstan par bya //

original: zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: It is connected in this way.

original: rnal 'byor pas zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas zhes shes par bya'o //

original: de la las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis byung bas na srid pa ste /
analyzed: de la las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis byung bas na srid pa ste /

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o //
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o //
translated: It is the five appropriated aggregates.

original: de'i mchog ni dam pa ste longs spyod kyi yul rnams so //
analyzed: de'i mchog ni dam pa ste longs spyod kyi yul rnams so //

analyzed: 'o na de ni 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin no //

original: ci'i phyir bsten ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir bsten ce na /

original: bsten bya zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: bsten bya zhes bya ba gsungs te /

original: bsten bya ni bsten par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: bsten bya ni bsten par bya ba nyid do //

analyzed: mkhas pa'i thar pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: ji ltar bsten zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bsten zhe na /

original: yul ming byas nas zhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: yul ming byas nas zhes gsungs pa ste /

original: yul ni spyod yul lo //
analyzed: yul ni spyod yul lo //

original: med pa ni dgag pa'i tshig ste /
analyzed: med pa ni dgag pa'i tshig ste /

original: yul rnams rang bzhin gyis ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: yul rnams rang bzhin gyis ngo bo nyid med pa'o //

original: 'bad pa ni de shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'bad pa ni de shes pa'o //

original: yang na bi sha ni dug ste yul de rnams la gzung ba la sogs pa'i mngon par zhen pa nyid dug ste /
analyzed: yang na bi sha ni dug ste yul de rnams la gzung ba la sogs pa'i mngon par zhen pa nyid dug ste /
translated: Alternatively, vi·π£a means poison. The attachment to those objects as percepts and perceivers is poison.

original: dug med ces bya ba gsungs te //

original: zhes bya ba @76a * //

analyzed: de nyid phul du byung bas na mchog gi bdag nyid can no //

translated: Having made it one with one's own consciousness, one should recite the mantra from the mouth, and at that very time, one should visualize the one to be accomplished, whether male or female, mounted on the wind mandala, and coming. If one does so, one will undoubtedly summon them.

original: // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /

analyzed: gang gi zhes bya ba ni gang dang gang gi phyir ro //

original: rab tu sbyor ba ni sbyor ba'i bye brag ste /

original: 'gugs pa ste /
analyzed: 'gugs pa ste /
translated: Summoning means

analyzed: mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro //

original: dmar po ru ni bsgoms nas su //

analyzed: yi ge aom nyid kyi mdog cung zad dmar bar bya'o //

original: de nas cho ga bzhin du bya //
analyzed: de nas cho ga bzhin du bya //

analyzed: dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan par //
translated: Endowed with the second vowel

translated: at the time of practice, one should meditate on the dakinis as having jackal faces. From the wound made by the subtle vajra-weapon, one should meditate on oneself and the dakinis sucking out the victim's bones and skin, leaving nothing but dry bones and skin.

translated: All of these rites are accomplished by meditation and repetition for a long time without interruption, with devotion. They are not accomplished otherwise. This is the completion of the rites.

original: sgyu ma kun ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad do //
analyzed: sgyu ma kun ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad do //

analyzed: rnam par 'phrul ba ni de rnam par rol cing rtsa ba'o //

original: man ngag de ston pa'i gzhung ni rim par phye ba ste bcu gcig pa'o //
analyzed: man ngag de ston pa'i gzhung ni rim par phye ba ste bcu gcig pa'o //
translated: The text that teaches that instruction is the eleventh chapter.

original: rgyud kyi rgyal lo dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par bshad pa las le'u bcu gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyal lo dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par bshad pa las le'u bcu gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /

original: // / da ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshul gzhan gyi sgrub thabs ston pa'i le'u gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / da ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshul gzhan gyi sgrub thabs ston pa'i le'u gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the chapter that teaches the means of achieving the other method of the Vajradaka is stated:

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nyon zhes bya ba ni sngon du bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa gang yin pa de nyon cig ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nyon zhes bya ba ni sngon du bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa gang yin pa de nyon cig ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Listen to the Vajradaka, etc. , Listen means listen to what was previously requested of the Lord.

original: dang por ro ni bsgom bya ste //
analyzed: dang por ro ni bsgom bya ste //
translated: First, one should meditate on the corpse, etc.

original: zhes bya ba la mchod pa la sogs pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rjes la ri bo lhun po'i steng du khang ba brtsegs ma'i nang du padma'i steng na gnas par bsgom pa'o //

original: dang po zhes bya ba ni aa la sogs pa dang sa bon h'um la sogs pa la ltos pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: dang po zhes bya ba ni aa la sogs pa dang sa bon h'um la sogs pa la ltos pa'i tshig go //

original: mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid rtogs pa'i sgrub pa po'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid rtogs pa'i sgrub pa po'o //

analyzed: dbyings ni rang bzhin te don dam par gzung ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'i stong pa nyid do //

original: de yang 'di ltar sems 'ba' zhig po nyid thog ma med pa'i dus nas spros pa'i bag chags kyis dkrugs pas phyi rol lta bur gnyis su snang ba yin @79a * //

analyzed: gyi ; dngos po rnams bden par yod pa ma yin par sngar bstan to //

original: de yang gsungs pa /

analyzed: mchod pa ni yid kyis rdo rje bla ma la sogs pa la yang dag par mchod pa'o //

original: kun nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: mchis pa ni der gnas pa ste /
analyzed: mchis pa ni der gnas pa ste /

analyzed: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob kyi bar du'o //

original: bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: bya ba gsungs pa /

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: dus de rnams su spyod pa'i gshegs pa dang / gshegs bzhin pa dang / byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so //

analyzed: de bzhin nyid skyob pas na mgon po'o // yang dag byang chub nges mdzad pa //

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /

original: nges mdzad ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i tshogs ma lus pa bsags par bya ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: nges mdzad ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i tshogs ma lus pa bsags par bya ba'i mtshan nyid do //

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: yang dag byang chub kyi phyir te /
analyzed: yang dag byang chub kyi phyir te /

analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi byang chub kyi ched du'o //

original: 'dir ched kyi bdun pa mi mngon pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ched kyi bdun pa mi mngon pa yin no //
translated: Here the seventh case is not expressed.

original: bla med byang chub sems zhes bya ba la byang chub kyi sems ni smon pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: bla med byang chub sems zhes bya ba la byang chub kyi sems ni smon pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The so-called thought of enlightenment is the thought of enlightenment of aspiration and the thought of enlightenment of engagement.

original: de la smon pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni bdag rdo rje 'kha'  'gror gyur nas sems can thams cad kyang go 'phang de la dgod par bya'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa dang bcas pa'i smon lam mo //üîΩ'jug pa byang chub kyi sems ni de'i lam sbyin pa la sogs pa @80a * //

original: nyams su len pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: nyams su len pa'i rang bzhin te /

original: de gnyis ni bla na med pa'i 'bras bu sgrub par byed pas na bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: de gnyis ni bla na med pa'i 'bras bu sgrub par byed pas na bla na med pa'o //

original: de bzhin bskyed par bgyi zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs na byang chub kyi phyir thugs bskyed pa mdzad //
analyzed: de bzhin bskyed par bgyi zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs na byang chub kyi phyir thugs bskyed pa mdzad //

analyzed: pa dang / skyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur bar ltar bdag gis kyang bskyed pa'o //

original: yang na mgon po ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: yang na mgon po ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //

original: de yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yang gsungs pa /

analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems bskyed pa //

analyzed: gang yin sangs rgyas nyid ces bya //

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de nyid sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o //

original: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor skyes sngom pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor skyes sngom pa //

analyzed: zhes pa la sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad do //

analyzed: lus la sogs pa bya ba ma yin pa las bzlog cing sdud pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o //

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: chos ni 'dzin pas na chos te /
analyzed: chos ni 'dzin pas na chos te /

original: lung dang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: lung dang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin no //

original: 'dus pa ni dge 'dun te /
analyzed: 'dus pa ni dge 'dun te /
translated: The Sa·πÖgha is the assembly.

original: 'jam dpal rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: 'jam dpal rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o //

translated: Here, first, from ya·πÉ arises a bow-shaped wind ma·πá·∏çala. From ra·πÉ arises a fire ma·πá·∏çala above that. From a arises a skull cup on that.

analyzed: sbyor ba'i dngos grub rig pa che //

analyzed: yid tshes ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o //

original: sgyu 'phrul chen mo la sogs par byin gyis brlabs pa la longs spyod pa ste /
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen mo la sogs par byin gyis brlabs pa la longs spyod pa ste /

analyzed: gnas ni phung po'o //

original: gsum ni tshogs gsum ste /
analyzed: gsum ni tshogs gsum ste /

analyzed: rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur //

original: zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni shin tu rno ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni shin tu rno ba ste /

analyzed: gsal zhing dri ma med pa des mthong ba'o //

original: ji ltar zha na /
analyzed: ji ltar zha na /

original: yang na rgyud ni rgyud 'dir ro //
analyzed: yang na rgyud ni rgyud 'dir ro //

original: sngags ni sngags thams cad de sngags de rnams kyi yi ge bstan pa'i dus su ni lugs su 'byung bar bri la zlos pa'i dus su ni lugs las bzlog ste bzla'o //

analyzed: rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor lngas ni rnam brgyan pa // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: adorned with five ma·πá·∏çalas.

analyzed: ri rab lhun po'i steng du ni //

original: steng de'i bla mar gyur pa ste /
analyzed: steng de'i bla mar gyur pa ste /

analyzed: bsam pa ni bri ba'o //

analyzed: kha cig ni 'di dag ni sgra ji bzhin yin te /

analyzed: gzhan du na cung zad cam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: de bzhin du yad lingga'i lte ba ste / rdo rje nor bu'i zla ba la dgod par @84a * //

analyzed: bya'o // padma'i lte ba rnams su sbyar //

analyzed: sdig pa rnams rmel zhing sel bas na aa ba dh'u t'i ste gnyis su med pa'i sems so //

analyzed: snyam par sbyor ba'i skad cig de nyid la dbyangs yig dang po'i thig le las steng du 'bar ro zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'byung gnas bsgoms kyi 'og tu'o //

analyzed: 'bar phreng rgya mtsho'i 'khor lo ni khang bu brtsegs pa ste /

analyzed: yang ci 'dra zhe na /
